title: Spinning Reserve
description: Synchronized generation and ready to serve additional demand.

sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > Unloaded generation that is synchronized and ready to serve additional demand.

sections.title: Definition by PJM
sections.body_md: > Synchronized Reserve is reserve capability that can be converted fully into energy or load that can be removed from the system within 10 minutes of the request from the PJM dispatcher and must be provided by equipment electrically synchronized to the system. Resources committed to the Synchronized Reserve product can meet the Synchronized Reserve, Contingency (Primary) Reserve Service and the 30-Minute Reserve Service simultaneously.
